The world would be overrun by creative and innovative ideas, leading to rapid technological advancements and progress.
The job market would be drastically changed as everyone would be able to do everything and everyone would be competing for jobs.
The concept of intelligence would become obsolete as everyone would have equal abilities.
Society would have to adapt to the new norm of having a population of geniuses, leading to a shift in social and political structures.
The rise of a new class of super-intelligent individuals would lead to a new form of inequality, where those who are not geniuses would be left behind.
